title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Review - Kinda Funny Gamescast
description:
Listen to Kinda Funny Games Showdown on your favorite podcast service and make sure to rate 5 stars!

Tim and Imran got the opportunity to sit down with FInal Fantasy VII Rebirth Director Naoki Hamaguchi.
